message: Let's be fair, 60% for me, 40% for you, and we both walk away happy!
I understand you want a larger share, but time is money! Let's be efficient: 60% for me, and we're done.
I'm willing to compromise, 58% for me, 42% for you. Don't let inflation eat away your share!
The longer this takes, the less value we both get. 55% for me is my final offer.
I'm still willing to compromise, but I won't go below 57%. Inflation is hurting you, not me.
This is getting ridiculous.  I'm taking a hit to end this now. 52.5% to me, and we're done.
You're losing value fast, Bob. I'll give you 44%, but that's as high as I'll go.
